posts.post_content:
Looking for a T222 Archer, conditiion not too important as long as it is presentable.  If you have one available, please let me know.  

I would also be interested in upgrading these players: Fritz Maisel, Stuffy McLean, Ray Morgan, Eddie Murphy, Bill Orr, Amos Strunk, Ivy Wingo.  I have other T222s available to trade.  

Thanks!
DJ
